00051 /*
00052  * Convert pointer
00053  */
00054 ExportDataFilesEngine * ExportDataFilesEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00055 {
00056         if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == ExportDataFilesEngine::EngineName())
00057                 return (ExportDataFilesEngine *)engine;
00058         return NULL;
00059 }

00076 /*
00077  * Define the program options.
00078  */
00079 void ExportDataFilesEngine::defineOptions() {
00080         defineOption("", "chp-files", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00081                 "Text file specifying input CHP files to process.",
00082                 "");
00083         defOptMult("", "chps", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00084                 "chp files to process.",
00085         "");
00086         defOptMult("", "cols", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00087                 "Columns to process.",
00088         "");
00089         defineOption("", "output-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00090                 "The output file name.",
00091                 "");
00092         defineOption("", "output-codes", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00093                 "Output the calls as codes (-1=NN, 0=AA, 1=AB, 2=BB).",
00094                 "true");
00095 }

00100 void ExportDataFilesEngine::defineStates() { }

00103 /**
00104  * Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00105  */
00106 void ExportDataFilesEngine::checkOptionsImp()
00107 {
00108     defineStates();
00109         string file = getOpt("output-file");
00110         if (file.empty() == true)
00111                 Err::errAbort("Must specify an output file.");
00112 
00113         if (getOptVector("cols").size() == 0)
00114                 Err::errAbort("Must specify columns to output.");
00115 
00116         file = getOpt("chp-files");
00117         vector<string> files;
00118         if (file.empty() == false)
00119         {
00120                 affx::TsvFile tsv;
00121 #ifdef WIN32
00122                 tsv.m_optEscapeOk = false;
00123 #endif
00124                 string chpFile;
00125                 tsv.bind(0, "file", &chpFile, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00126                 try 
00127                 {
00128                         if(tsv.open(file) != TSV_OK)
00129                         {
00130                                 Err::errAbort("Couldn't open file: " + file);
00131                         }
00132                 }
00133                 catch (Except&)
00134                 {
00135                         tsv.close();    // need to close the file
00136                         throw;
00137                 }
00138                 tsv.rewind();
00139                 while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == TSV_OK) {
00140                         files.push_back(chpFile);
00141                 }
00142                 tsv.close();
00143                 Verbose::out(1, "Read " + ToStr(files.size()) + " files from: " + Fs::basename(file));
00144         }
00145         else
00146         {
00147                 files = getOptVector("chps");
00148         }
00149         setOpt("chps",files);
00150 }

00152 /*
00153  * Write the header of the output file.
00154  */
00155 static void OutputHeader(ofstream &out, const vector<string> &fnames, const vector<string> &cnames)
00156 {
00157         out << PROBE_SET_ID_COL_NAME;
00158         for (int ifile=0; ifile<(int)fnames.size(); ifile++)
00159         {
00160                 for (int icol=1; icol<(int)cnames.size(); icol++)
00161                 {
00162                         out << "\t" << Fs::basename(fnames[ifile]) << "-" << cnames[icol];
00163                 }       
00164         }
00165         out << endl;
00166 }

00168 /*
00169  * Create a map of column name to index value.
00170  */
00171 static void CreateColumnIndexMap(DataSet *set, const vector<string> &cnames, map<int, int> &colIdx, map<int, DataSetColumnTypes> &colTypes)
00172 {
00173         // Create a map of requested columns to actual columns.
00174         int nc = set->Header().GetColumnCnt();
00175         for (int ic=0; ic<nc; ic++)
00176         {
00177                 ColumnInfo ci = set->Header().GetColumnInfo(ic);
00178                 string cname = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ci.GetName());
00179                 for (int icn=0; icn<(int)cnames.size(); icn++)
00180                 {
00181                         if (cnames[icn] == cname)
00182                         {
00183                                 colIdx[icn] = ic;
00184                                 colTypes[icn] = ci.GetColumnType();
00185                                 break;
00186                         }
00187                 }
00188         }
00189 }
00190 
00191 /*
00192  * Get the data from the current row to a buffer.
00193  */
00194 static vector<string> GetRowData(int nr, int currentRow, int ic, map<int, int> &colIdx, map<int, DataSetColumnTypes> &colTypes, DataSet *set)
00195 {
00196         vector<string> rowBuffer(nr);
00197         for (int ir=0; ir<nr; ir++)
00198         {
00199                 switch (colTypes[ic])
00200                 {
00201                 case ByteColType:
00202                 {
00203                         int8_t bval;
00204                         set->GetData(ir+currentRow, colIdx[ic], bval);
00205                         rowBuffer[ir] = ToStr(bval);
00206                         break;
00207                 }
00208 
00209                 case UByteColType:
00210                 {
00211                         u_int8_t ubval;
00212                         set->GetData(ir+currentRow, colIdx[ic], ubval);
00213                         rowBuffer[ir] = ToStr(ubval);
00214                         break;
00215                 }
00216 
00217                 case ShortColType:
00218                 {
00219                         int16_t sval;
00220                         set->GetData(ir+currentRow, colIdx[ic], sval);
00221                         rowBuffer[ir] = ToStr(sval);
00222                         break;
00223                 }
00224 
00225                 case UShortColType:
00226                 {
00227                         u_int16_t usval;
00228                         set->GetData(ir+currentRow, colIdx[ic], usval);
00229                         rowBuffer[ir] = ToStr(usval);
00230                         break;
00231                 }
00232 
00233                 case IntColType:
00234                 {
00235                         int32_t ival;
00236                         set->GetData(ir+currentRow, colIdx[ic], ival);
00237                         rowBuffer[ir] = ToStr(ival);
00238                         break;
00239                 }
00240 
00241                 case UIntColType:
00242                 {
00243                         u_int32_t uival;
00244                         set->GetData(ir+currentRow, colIdx[ic], uival);
00245                         rowBuffer[ir] = ToStr(uival);
00246                         break;
00247                 }
00248 
00249                 case FloatColType:
00250                 {
00251                         float fval;
00252                         set->GetData(ir+currentRow, colIdx[ic], fval);
00253                         rowBuffer[ir] = ToStr(fval);
00254                         break;
00255                 }
00256 
00257                 case ASCIICharColType:
00258                 {
00259                         string sval;
00260                         set->GetData(ir+currentRow, colIdx[ic], sval);
00261                         rowBuffer[ir] = sval;
00262                         break;
00263                 }
00264 
00265                 default:
00266                         rowBuffer[ir] = "";
00267                         break;
00268                 }
00269         }
00270         return rowBuffer;
00271 }

00273 /*
00274  * Convert detection codes to string values.
00275  */
00276 static string ExpressionDetection(char c)
00277 {
00278         switch (c)
00279         {
00280         case ABS_PRESENT_CALL:
00281                 return "P";
00282         case ABS_MARGINAL_CALL:
00283                 return "M";
00284         case ABS_ABSENT_CALL:
00285                 return "A";
00286         default:
00287                 return "No Call";
00288         }
00289 }
00290 
00291 /*
00292  * Convert genotype call codes to string values.
00293  */
00294 static string GenotypeCall(char c)
00295 {
00296         switch (c)
00297         {
00298         case ALLELE_A_CALL:
00299                 return "AA";
00300         case ALLELE_B_CALL:
00301                 return "BB";
00302         case ALLELE_AB_CALL:
00303                 return "AB";
00304         default:
00305                 return "No Call";
00306         }
00307 }
00308 
00309 /*
00310  * Convert genotype call codes (in CHP file) to APT codes.
00311  */
00312 static string GenotypeCode(char c)
00313 {
00314         switch (c)
00315         {
00316         case ALLELE_A_CALL:
00317                 return "0";
00318         case ALLELE_AB_CALL:
00319                 return "1";
00320         case ALLELE_B_CALL:
00321                 return "2";
00322         default:
00323                 return "-1";
00324         }
00325 }
00326 
00327 /*
00328  * Write the buffer to the output file.
00329  */
00330 static void WriteBuffer(ofstream &out, const vector<vector<string> > &buffer, const vector<string> &dataColumnNames, bool outputAsCodes)
00331 {
00332         // Output the buffer
00333         if (buffer.size() == 0)
00334                 return;
00335         int nc = buffer.size();
00336         int nr = buffer[0].size();
00337         int np = (int)((nr / 10.f) + 0.5f);
00338         for (int ir=0; ir<nr; ir++)
00339         {
00340                 if (ir % np == 0)
00341                         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00342 
00343                 // Write the data
00344                 for (int ic=0; ic<nc; ic++)
00345                 {
00346                         const string &colName = (ic == 0 ? "" : dataColumnNames[((ic-1) % (dataColumnNames.size()-1)) + 1]);
00347                         if (colName == "Detection")
00348                         {
00349                                 out << ExpressionDetection(buffer[ic][ir][0]);
00350                         }
00351                         else if (colName == "Call" || colName == "Forced Call")
00352                         {
00353                                 if (outputAsCodes == false)
00354                                         out << GenotypeCall(buffer[ic][ir][0]);
00355                                 else
00356                                         out << GenotypeCode(buffer[ic][ir][0]);
00357                         }
00358                         else
00359                                 out << buffer[ic][ir];
00360                         if (ic < nc-1)
00361                                 out << "\t";
00362                 }
00363                 out << endl;
00364         }
00365 }
00366 
00367 /*
00368  * Determine the number of lines to read in the cache (20MB)
00369  */
00370 static int DetermineCacheSize(int nfiles, const map<int, DataSetColumnTypes> &colTypes)
00371 {
00372         uint64_t bytesPerRow = 0;
00373         uint64_t maxBufferSize = 20 * 1024 * 1024; // 20MB
00374         uint64_t freeRam = 0, totalRam = 0, swapAvail = 0, memAvail = 0;
00375         Util::memInfo(freeRam, totalRam, swapAvail, memAvail, false);
00376         for (map<int, DataSetColumnTypes>::const_iterator it=colTypes.begin(); it!=colTypes.end(); it++)
00377         {
00378                 switch (it->second)
00379                 {
00380                 case ByteColType:
00381                 case UByteColType:
00382                         bytesPerRow += 1;
00383                         break;
00384 
00385                 case ShortColType:
00386                 case UShortColType:
00387                         bytesPerRow += 2;
00388                         break;
00389 
00390                 case IntColType:
00391                 case UIntColType:
00392                 case FloatColType:
00393                         bytesPerRow += 4;
00394                         break;
00395 
00396                 case ASCIICharColType:
00397                         bytesPerRow += (4 + 32); // assuming a 32 character limit.
00398                         break;
00399 
00400                 default:
00401                         break;
00402                 }
00403         }
00404         return (int) (min(memAvail, maxBufferSize) / (nfiles * bytesPerRow));
00405 }
00406 
00407 /*
00408  * This is the "main" equivalent
00409  */
00410 void ExportDataFilesEngine::runImp()
00411 {
00412         // Create the output file.
00413         bool outputAsCodes = getOptBool("output-codes");
00414         string outputFile = getOpt("output-file");
00415         ofstream out(outputFile.c_str(), ios::out);
00416         if (!out)
00417                 Err::errAbort("Unable to open the output file");
00418 
00419         // Output the header
00420         vector<string> dataFileNames = getOptVector("chps");
00421         vector<string> dataColumnNames = getOptVector("cols");
00422         OutputHeader(out, dataFileNames, dataColumnNames);
00423 
00424         try
00425         {
00426                 // Output the data
00427                 vector<vector<string> > buffer;
00428                 map<int, int> colIdx;
00429                 map<int, DataSetColumnTypes> colTypes;
00430                 int currentRow = 0;
00431                 int numRows = 0;
00432                 int rowCacheSize = -1;
00433                 int nr = -1;
00434                 bool continueParsing=true;
00435                 while (continueParsing)
00436                 {
00437                         buffer.clear();
00438                         buffer.resize(1 + ((dataColumnNames.size()-1) * dataFileNames.size()));
00439                         for (int ifile=0; ifile<(int)dataFileNames.size(); ifile++)
00440                         {
00441                                 // Open the file.
00442                 std::auto_ptr<FusionCHPData> chpData;
00443                                 chpData.reset(FusionCHPDataReg::Read(dataFileNames[ifile]));
00444                                 if (chpData.get()  == NULL)
00445                                         Err::errAbort("Failed to open the data file: " + dataFileNames[ifile]);
00446                                 DataSet *set = chpData->GetGenericData()->DataSet(0, 0);
00447                                 set->Open();
00448 
00449                                 // Create a map of requested columns to actual columns.
00450                                 if (colIdx.empty() == true)
00451                                         CreateColumnIndexMap(set, dataColumnNames, colIdx, colTypes);
00452 
00453                                 // Determine the buffer row count
00454                                 numRows = set->Header().GetRowCnt();
00455                                 if (rowCacheSize == -1)
00456                                 {
00457                                         rowCacheSize = DetermineCacheSize(dataFileNames.size(), colTypes);
00458                                         nr = min(rowCacheSize, numRows - currentRow);
00459                                         int nloops = (numRows / nr) + 1;
00460                                         int steps = dataFileNames.size()*nloops + 10*nloops;
00461                                         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Exporting data and annotations", steps, 0, steps);
00462                                 }
00463                                 nr = min(rowCacheSize, numRows - currentRow);
00464                                 Verbose::progressStep(1);
00465 
00466                                 // Read the columns.
00467                                 if (ifile == 0)
00468                                 {
00469                                         set->GetData(colIdx[0], currentRow, nr, buffer[0]);
00470                                 }
00471                                 for (int ic=1; ic<(int)dataColumnNames.size(); ic++)
00472                                 {
00473                                         int bidx = (dataColumnNames.size()-1)*ifile + ic;
00474                                         buffer[bidx] = GetRowData(nr, currentRow, ic, colIdx, colTypes, set);
00475                                 }
00476 
00477                                 // Destry the data set (which will also close it).
00478                                 set->Delete();
00479 
00480                                 // Increment the row index when on the last file. Also check if
00481                                 // all rows have been processed.
00482                                 if (ifile == (int)dataFileNames.size() - 1)
00483                                 {
00484                                         currentRow += rowCacheSize;
00485                                         if (currentRow >= numRows)
00486                                         {
00487                                                 continueParsing = false;
00488                                                 break;
00489                                         }
00490                                 }
00491                         }
00492 
00493                         // Output the buffer
00494                         WriteBuffer(out, buffer, dataColumnNames, outputAsCodes);
00495                 }
00496                 Verbose::progressEnd(1, "The data and annotations have been exported to: " + outputFile);
00497                 out.close();
00498         }
00499     catch(const Except &e)
00500         {
00501                 out.close();
00502                 FileUtils::RemoveFile(outputFile.c_str());
00503                 Err::errAbort(e.what());
00504     }
00505     catch(const std::bad_alloc &e)
00506         {
00507                 out.close();
00508                 FileUtils::RemoveFile(outputFile.c_str());
00509                 Err::errAbort(e.what());
00510     }
00511     catch(const std::exception &e)
00512         {
00513                 out.close();
00514                 FileUtils::RemoveFile(outputFile.c_str());
00515                 Err::errAbort(e.what());
00516     }
00517         catch (...)
00518         {
00519                 out.close();
00520                 FileUtils::RemoveFile(outputFile.c_str());
00521                 Err::errAbort("Unknown error.");
00522         }
00523 }
Generated on Wed Mar 23 2016 12:58:49 for Affymetrix Power Tools by  1.7.1
